FocusWriter is a distraction-free, fullscreen word processor designed for immersive writing. It offers a minimalist interface that hides away until needed, customizable themes for ambiance, and essential features like spell-checking and document statistics to aid productivity.

Refract is a Go-based policy enforcement service designed to control concurrent user sessions for Xray-core. It achieves this by monitoring access logs and using Linux kernel features like Netlink and IPSet to block unauthorized connections in real-time.
